name: Milestone XProtect
description: Milestone XProtect VMS alerts. 114 alert types covering cameras, recording, storage, servers, analytics, and system events.
author: OpsConductor

alerts.title: Automaticactivationfailed
alerts.description: Automatic failover activation failed. Manual intervention required to restore recording.

alerts.title: Database Error
alerts.description: Database error

alerts.title: Failoverauthorizationerror
alerts.description: Failover authorization failed. Backup server cannot take over. Check failover configuration and credentials.

alerts.title: Failoverencryptedcommunicationerror
alerts.description: Failover encrypted communication error. Secure failover channel is broken. Check certificates and network.

alerts.title: Failoverstarted
alerts.description: Failover has been activated. Primary Recording Server failed and backup has taken over. Investigate primary server failure immediately.

alerts.title: Failoverstopped
alerts.description: Failover has ended. Primary server has resumed control. Verify all cameras are recording on primary.

alerts.title: Managementserverfailovernodestarted
alerts.description: Management Server failover node has started. Primary Management Server may have failed.

alerts.title: Serviceavailablecritical
alerts.description: Critical service is unavailable. Core VMS functionality may be impacted.

alerts.title: Settingschangederror
alerts.description: Error occurred while changing settings. Configuration change may not have been applied.

alerts.title: Systemconfigurationchanged
alerts.description: System configuration was changed. Audit trail event.

alerts.title: Cpuusagecritical
alerts.description: Recording Server CPU usage is critically high. Server performance is degraded and may drop frames or fail to record. Consider load balancing or hardware upgrade.

alerts.title: Cpuusagewarning
alerts.description: Recording Server CPU usage is elevated. Monitor for further increase. May need to redistribute cameras or upgrade hardware.

alerts.title: Memoryusagecritical
alerts.description: Recording Server memory usage is critically high. Server may become unstable or crash. Restart services or add memory.

alerts.title: Memoryusagewarning
alerts.description: Recording Server memory usage is elevated. Monitor for memory leaks or consider adding RAM.

alerts.title: Nvidiadecodingcritical
alerts.description: Nvidia GPU decoding is critically overloaded. Hardware acceleration is failing. Check GPU health and driver.

alerts.title: Nvidiadecodingwarning
alerts.description: Nvidia GPU decoding load is high. Monitor for degradation.

alerts.title: Nvidiamemorycritical
alerts.description: Nvidia GPU memory is critically low. Video processing may fail.

alerts.title: Nvidiamemorywarning
alerts.description: Nvidia GPU memory usage is elevated.

alerts.title: Nvidiarenderingcritical
alerts.description: Nvidia GPU rendering is critically overloaded.

alerts.title: Nvidiarenderingwarning
alerts.description: Nvidia GPU rendering load is high.

alerts.title: Server Down
alerts.description: Server offline

alerts.title: Networklost
alerts.description: Network connection lost to device. Camera is offline. Check network infrastructure.

alerts.title: Powersupplyfailure
alerts.description: Power supply failure detected. Device may lose power.

alerts.title: Ptzpowerfailure
alerts.description: PTZ power failure. PTZ mechanism cannot operate.

alerts.title: Intrusionend
alerts.description: Intrusion detection event ended.

alerts.title: Licenseplatedetection
alerts.description: License plate detected by analytics.

alerts.title: Scheduledpasswordchangecompletedsuccessfully
alerts.description: Scheduled password change completed successfully.

alerts.title: Scheduledpasswordchangecompletedwitherrors
alerts.description: Scheduled password change completed with errors. Some devices may have old passwords.

alerts.title: Scheduledpasswordchangestarted
alerts.description: Scheduled password change operation started.

alerts.title: Smokeandfire
alerts.description: Smoke and fire detected by analytics. Immediate attention required.

alerts.title: Smokeandfireend
alerts.description: Smoke and fire detection event ended.

alerts.title: Stoppedvehiclestart
alerts.description: Stopped vehicle detected by analytics.

alerts.title: Stoppedvehiclestop
alerts.description: Stopped vehicle detection ended.

alerts.title: Archiveavailable
alerts.description: Archive storage is now available. Archiving operations can resume.

alerts.title: Archivediskavailable
alerts.description: Archive disk space is available.

alerts.title: Archivediskunavailable
alerts.description: Milestone archive disk unavailable. Storage location for archived recordings is inaccessible. Recordings cannot be archived. Check storage connectivity and health.

alerts.title: Archivenotfinished
alerts.description: Milestone archive job incomplete. Scheduled archiving did not complete successfully. Check storage space and archive job configuration.

alerts.title: Archiveunavailable
alerts.description: Archive storage is unavailable. Cannot archive recordings. Verify archive storage is online and accessible.

alerts.title: Archivingfailed
alerts.description: Archive operation failed. Recordings could not be moved to archive storage. Check archive destination accessibility and permissions.

alerts.title: Backup Failed
alerts.description: Backup failed

alerts.title: Databasearchivingsessionended
alerts.description: Database archiving session completed successfully.

alerts.title: Databasearchivingsessionstarted
alerts.description: Database archiving session started. Old recordings are being moved to archive storage.

alerts.title: Databasedeletebeforesetretentionsize
alerts.description: Recordings deleted before reaching configured retention size. Storage pressure may be causing premature deletion.

alerts.title: Databasedeletebeforesetretentiontime
alerts.description: Recordings deleted before reaching configured retention time. Storage is filling faster than expected.

alerts.title: Databasediskavailable
alerts.description: Database disk space is now available. Recording can resume normally.

alerts.title: Databasediskfull
alerts.description: Recording Server database disk is completely full. Recording has stopped for all cameras on this server. Immediately free disk space, expand storage, or adjust retention policies.

alerts.title: Databasediskfullautooarchive
alerts.description: Database disk full, auto-archive triggered. System is attempting to archive old recordings to free space. Monitor archive progress.

alerts.title: Databasediskfullautooarchiveevent
alerts.description: Auto-archive initiated due to full disk. Old recordings are being moved to archive storage.

alerts.title: Databasediskfullevent
alerts.description: Database disk full event triggered. No new recordings can be written. Critical action required to restore recording capability.

alerts.title: Databasediskunavailable
alerts.description: Database disk is unavailable. Storage may have failed or been disconnected. Check disk health and connections immediately.

alerts.title: Databasefullautooarchive
alerts.description: Database full, automatic archive in progress. System is managing storage automatically but capacity planning is needed.

alerts.title: Databaserepairevent
alerts.description: Database repair operation triggered. Database corruption was detected and is being repaired. Monitor for completion.

alerts.title: Databaserepairsessionended
alerts.description: Database repair session completed. Normal operations should resume.

alerts.title: Databaserepairsessionstarted
alerts.description: Database repair session has started. Some recording operations may be affected during repair.

alerts.title: Diskspacelow
alerts.description: Disk space is running low. Monitor closely and plan for expansion.

alerts.title: Freespacecritical
alerts.description: Free disk space is critically low. Recording will stop imminently. Immediately free space or expand storage.

alerts.title: Freespacenormal
alerts.description: Free disk space has returned to normal levels.

alerts.title: Freespaceundefined
alerts.description: Free disk space status is undefined. Storage monitoring may not be functioning correctly.

alerts.title: Freespacewarning
alerts.description: Free disk space is running low. Plan storage expansion or cleanup before recording stops.

alerts.title: Manualarchive
alerts.description: Manual archive operation initiated by user.

alerts.title: Retentiontimecritical
alerts.description: Retention time is critically short. Recordings are being deleted much sooner than configured. Storage capacity issue.

alerts.title: Retentiontimewarning
alerts.description: Retention time is shorter than expected. Monitor storage usage.

alerts.title: Sdcarderror
alerts.description: SD card error on camera. Edge storage may be failing. Check camera SD card health.

alerts.title: Sdcardrecording
alerts.description: Camera is recording to SD card (edge storage active).

alerts.title: Storagealert
alerts.description: Storage alert from camera. Check edge storage status.

alerts.title: Storageavailable
alerts.description: Camera edge storage is available.

alerts.title: Storagedisruption
alerts.description: Storage disruption detected. Recording may be interrupted.

alerts.title: Storagefull
alerts.description: Camera edge storage is full. Local recording has stopped.

alerts.title: Storagelocked
alerts.description: Storage is locked.

alerts.title: Storagereadonly
alerts.description: Storage is in read-only mode. Cannot write new recordings.

alerts.title: Storageremoved
alerts.description: Storage media was removed from camera.

alerts.title: Storage Warning
alerts.description: Storage space low

alerts.title: Usedspacecritical
alerts.description: Used disk space has reached critical threshold. Storage is nearly full.

alerts.title: Usedspacenormal
alerts.description: Used disk space has returned to normal levels.

alerts.title: Usedspaceundefined
alerts.description: Used disk space status is undefined.

alerts.title: Usedspacewarning
alerts.description: Used disk space is approaching capacity. Plan for storage expansion.

alerts.title: Camera Online
alerts.description: Camera online

alerts.title: Daborunawayfrom
alerts.description: Database maintenance overdue. Milestone database optimization has not run as scheduled. May affect performance.

alerts.title: Motion Stopped
alerts.description: Motion stopped

alerts.title: Recording Started
alerts.description: Recording started

alerts.title: Server Started
alerts.description: Server started

alerts.title: Storage Critical
alerts.description: Storage space critical

alerts.title: Camera Offline
alerts.description: Camera offline

alerts.title: Communicationerror
alerts.description: Milestone camera communication error. Recording server cannot communicate with camera. Check network connectivity, camera power, and credentials.

alerts.title: Communicationerrorhardware
alerts.description: Milestone hardware communication failure. Critical hardware component not responding. May affect recording capability. Check physical connections and hardware health.

alerts.title: Communicationstarted
alerts.description: Device communication has been restored. The device is now online and recording should resume. Previous offline alert should auto-resolve.

alerts.title: Communicationstartedhardware
alerts.description: Hardware device communication restored. Camera/encoder is back online and operational.

alerts.title: Communicationstopped
alerts.description: Camera or device has stopped communicating with the Recording Server. The device is offline and not recording. Check network connectivity, power supply, and device health immediately.

alerts.title: Communicationstoppedhardware
alerts.description: Hardware device (camera, encoder) has lost communication with the Recording Server. No video is being recorded from this device. Verify network path, PoE power, and device status.

alerts.title: Fanfailure
alerts.description: Fan failure detected on device. Camera may overheat without cooling.

alerts.title: Feedoverflowstopped
alerts.description: Feed overflow condition has ended. Stream buffering has recovered.

alerts.title: Hardwarefailure
alerts.description: Hardware failure detected on device. Camera component may have failed.

alerts.title: Livefpscritical
alerts.description: Live video frame rate is critically low. Live viewing is severely degraded.

alerts.title: Livefpswarning
alerts.description: Live video frame rate is below expected.

alerts.title: Manualrecordingstarted
alerts.description: Manual recording initiated by operator.

alerts.title: Manualrecordingstopped
alerts.description: Manual recording stopped by operator.

alerts.title: Motion Started
alerts.description: Motion detected

alerts.title: Motionstarted
alerts.description: Motion detected on camera. Normal operation for motion-triggered recording.

alerts.title: Motionstopped
alerts.description: Motion detection stopped. Camera motion detection ended. Normal event indicating end of motion activity.

alerts.title: Ptzerror
alerts.description: PTZ error detected. Camera may be stuck or unable to move.

alerts.title: Ptzmanualsessionstarted
alerts.description: PTZ manual control session started.

alerts.title: Ptzmanualsessionstopped
alerts.description: PTZ manual control session ended.

alerts.title: Recordingfpscritical
alerts.description: Recording frame rate is critically low. Video quality is severely degraded. Check camera, network, or server load.

alerts.title: Recordingfpsnormal
alerts.description: Recording frame rate has returned to normal.

alerts.title: Recordingfpsundefined
alerts.description: Recording frame rate status is undefined.

alerts.title: Recordingfpswarning
alerts.description: Recording frame rate is below expected. Video quality may be affected.

alerts.title: Recordingsavailable
alerts.description: Recordings are available for playback.

alerts.title: Recordingsevidencelocked
alerts.description: Recordings have been evidence-locked to prevent deletion.

alerts.title: Recordingsevidenceunlocked
alerts.description: Evidence lock removed from recordings.

alerts.title: Recordingstarted
alerts.description: Recording started on camera. Camera has begun recording, typically triggered by motion or schedule.

alerts.title: Recording Stopped
alerts.description: Recording stopped

alerts.title: Recordingstopped
alerts.description: Recording stopped unexpectedly. Camera recording halted outside normal schedule. Check camera and storage status.

alerts.title: Requeststartrecording
alerts.description: Recording start requested.

alerts.title: Requeststoprecording
alerts.description: Recording stop requested.

clear_events.description: Alerts auto-resolve when condition no longer detected
